PH120 - The Time and The Work (1919)


       The Gospel Commission 

     "GO YE INTO ALL THE WORLD, AND PREACH THE GOSPEL TO EVERY CREATURE," IS THE COMMISSION JESUS GAVE TO THE MEMBERS OF HIS CHURCH. HIS CONFIDENCE THAT THEY WOULD ACCOMPLISH THE TASK ASSIGNED THEM, AND NOT DISAPPOINT HIM, HE EXPRESSED WHEN, IN ANSWER TO THE INQUIRY, "WHAT SHALL BE THE SIGN OF THY COMING, AND OF THE END OF THE WORLD?" HE SAID, "THIS GOSPEL OF THE KINGDOM SHALL BE PREACHED IN ALL THE WORLD FOR A WITNESS UNTO ALL NATIONS; AND THEN SHALL THE END COME."
